explains: adj. 以菱形孔金属丝网制做的

sentences.en: On a chain-link fence along Route 39 hangs a homemade poster, peppered with hearts, thanking firefighters and police.
sentences.cn: 39号公路沿线的铁丝网上挂着一张人们自制的海报，上面布满了心形图案，以感谢消防员和警察。

sentences.en: Jack Gleeson, 17, a high school student working a summer job at the airport, caught up to Schum and, with Bochter's help, hoisted the chain-link fence and brought Brillo underneath it.
sentences.cn: 在机场做暑期工作的17岁高中生——杰克·格里森，追上了 Schum，在布罗切特的帮助下，举起了铁丝网围栏，把布里洛拖到了围栏下面。

sentences.en: Another drop scenario: San Quentin backs up to a main road in San Rafael, with only a chain-link fence separating its grounds from civilization.
sentences.cn: 另一组手机进入事件：圣昆廷监狱靠坐落在圣拉斐尔的主干道上，与外界只有一墙之隔。
